entries.title: üé∏ Neighborhood porch concerts
entries.snippet: The community-driven, hyper-local and free concerts celebrate three things Richmond does incredibly well: neighborhoods, front porches and live music.

entries.title: Greater Heights
entries.snippet: Southside neighborhood Woodland Heights takes porch concerts to the next level.

Soon the lush streets of Woodland Heights will come alive with the sounds of strings, beats, horns, and songs this summer. Meet the Tiny Porch concert series, which brings neighbors out for what organizer Emily McMillen describes as ‚Äúmagical.‚Äù
entries.title: Southside Richmond neighborhood takes porch concerts to the next level
2024 Tiny Porch Kickoff
entries.snippet: Tonight marked the return of the Woodland Heights Tiny Porch Concert series, a grassroots community effort led by a dedicated group of neighbors that launched in 2023. Held on select Sunday evenings in the Woodland Heights neighborhood, the event includes three host porches, each boasting two impressive sets of musical performances.

entries.title: Tiny porch concerts take over Woodland Heights
entries.snippet: The next round of concerts takes place across three porches and features six groups of performers on Sunday, July 21.

entries.title: Top 5 Weekend Events
entries.snippet: The Tiny Porch concert series is back again in the Woodland Heights neighborhood. On select Sunday evenings audiences can relax and explore the charming streets of Woodland Heights while listening to live music from local and diverse Richmond artists. The concert series revolves around three host porches featuring two sets of musical performances through out the evening.

entries.title: Tiny Porch Concerts to take over Richmond‚Äôs Woodland Heights neighborhood
entries.snippet: ‚ÄúThese outdoor Sunday events offer a chance for Woodland Heights residents, as well as those from nearby neighborhoods within walking distance, to come together, share smiles, engage in conversations, and relish in the music of local, diverse Richmond artists.‚Äù

entries.title: Richmond's Tiny Porch concerts bring music home
entries.snippet: Community and camaraderie among the neighborhood and surrounding areas is the goal.

entries.title: Emily McMillen's Ted Talk - Highlighting Tiny Porch
entries.snippet: Emily McMillen shows how small, intentional actions can transform a community. By organizing neighborhood gatherings and porch concerts, she turned isolation into connection, proving that everyday efforts can create a powerful sense of belonging. Community building is at the heart of Emily McMillen‚Äôs work. A passionate advocate for equitable education and literacy with nearly 15 years of experience, she also plays a key role in Tiny Porch Concerts, a grassroots movement fostering connection through music. Emily believes that stepping outside our comfort zones to engage with neighbors is essential for creating a brighter future. We are excited to have her speak this year! The Woodland Heights Tiny Porch Concert Series, launched in spring 2023, reflects this effort to unite communities through shared experiences.
